TopicTitle: Now this is podracing mk4: The ultimate pod racer

Articles.Content:
I have improved this is pod racing in every way and i am proud to present my best stock pod racer to date

Now this is podracing mk4 (For V1.0.2)

Description:

With advanced clipping technologies implemented for maximum performance a pod racer can not get much better than this, highly maneuverable, extremely fast this pod racer simply has no match when it comes to performance.

Part count: 217

Cost: 106,362

Weight: 17.5T

Flight instruction:

It is said that it takes jedi like reflexes to control a pod racer.

Action groups:

1: Toggle engines

2: Toggle air intake
